item.title: How to run Kakaotalk on Linux in 2020
item.author: zah@andrewzah.com (Andrew Zah)
item.description: Thankfully, installing Kakaotalk has become much easier than before now that it’s 64bit. Preparation For this, we’ll need to install wine and playonlinux.
